00017 class C_Button : public C_FormElement
00018 {
00019     private :
00020         int x, y;           // pozice v ramci dveri
00021         int width, height;  // rozmery
00022         C_Color colorButton;    // barva tlacitka
00023         C_Color colorTitle;
00024 
00025         string title;

00027         char textAlign;     // zarovnani textu v tlacitku
00028 
00029         bool visible;       // je videt tento prvek, nemuze byt ani zmacknuto
00030         bool focus;         // je mys nad tlacitkem
00031         bool pushed;        // je dane tlacitko zmacknuto
00032         bool newUnpushed;   // nove odkliknuto
00033         bool newPushed;     // nove kliknuto
00034 
00035         bool IsPushed(int mouseX, int mouseY);    // bylo dane tlacitko zmacknuto?
00036         bool IsMouseOver(int mouseX, int mouseY); // nachazi se mys nad tlacitkem.
00037 
00038         static unsigned int nButton;            // pocet tlacitek v celem systemu
00039         unsigned int iButton;                   // cislo konkretniho tlacitka(od 1)
00040         static unsigned int iActiveButton;      // ktere tlacitko je aktivni (zadne, tak 0)
00041 
00042

00044         C_Button();

00050 
00051         void MainLoop(int mouseX, int mouseY);  // zde mouseX, mouseY bud pokud tlacitko ve dverich, tak interMouseX, interMouseY, nebo normalne App::Inst()->mouseX..
00052         void MouseClick(int mouseX, int mouseY);
00053         void Draw();
00054         void Set(int n_x, int n_y, int n_width, int n_height, string n_title, char n_textAlign = FontMan::ALIGN_HCENTER | FontMan::ALIGN_VCENTER, string n_help = "nohelp", C_Color n_buttonColor = C_Color::blueDark, C_Color n_titleColor = C_Color::blueLight);
00055         void SetVisible(bool n_visible) {visible = n_visible;};
00056         bool GetIsPushed() {return pushed;};
00057         string GetTitle() {return title;};
00058         int GetX() {return x;};
00059         int GetY() {return y;};
00060         int GetHeight() {return height;};
00061         int GetWidth() {return width;};
00062         bool GetNewUnpushed() {return newUnpushed;};
00063         bool GetNewPushed() {return newPushed;};
00064         void SetIsPushed(bool n_pushed) {pushed = n_pushed;};
00065         bool GetIsPushedAndUnpush() {bool temp = pushed; pushed = false; return temp;};
